option.name: notice
option.value: Copyright (c) $today.year. The copyright in the Software is owned by KaoEngine and is protected by Canadian and United States copyright laws and international treaty provisions. You must treat the Software as copyrighted material except that you may either (a) make one copy of the Software solely for backup or archival purposes, or (b) transfer the Software to a single hard disk, provided you keep the original solely for backup or archival purposes. You may not copy the written materials accompanying the Software.
